summary: A Nobel prize winner returns to his natal city looking for his home.
cast: Antonio Ferrandis|Encarna Paso|José Bódalo|Agustín González|Pablo Hoyos|Marta Fernández Muro|Pablo del Hoyo|Alfonso Cabeza Borque|Pedro Ruiz|Manuel Vega-Arango|Alfonso Cabeza|Luis Fernández de Eribe
title: Volver a empezar
